context_bundle.summary: Auto-update framework implementation for desktop applications using Sparkle (macOS), Squirrel/electron-updater (Electron), with appcast feeds and EdDSA signing

onboarding.quick_start: Implement Sparkle for macOS with EdDSA-signed appcast XML, or electron-updater for Electron apps with GitHub/S3/custom server hosting
common_patterns: Sparkle: Generate EdDSA keys, create appcast.xml with release notes and signatures
electron-updater: Configure autoUpdater with feed URL, handle update events
Squirrel: RELEASES file format for Windows, delta updates via bsdiff
Update strategies: Silent automatic, notify-only, scheduled, staged rollouts
Security: EdDSA/RSA signature verification, HTTPS endpoints, rollback support
known_errors: Sparkle requires EdDSA signatures (Ed25519) for security
electron-updater needs code signing for SmartScreen trust
Squirrel requires no admin privileges on Windows
Delta updates save bandwidth but add complexity
Always test rollback procedures before production
